org.jclouds.logging
Class BaseLogger

java.lang.Object
  org.jclouds.logging.BaseLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Logger
Direct Known Subclasses:
JDKLogger
public abstract class BaseLogger
extends Object
implements Logger

Base implementation that constructs formatted log strings.

Author:
Adrian Cole
